title: Ohiya Water Supply Scheme -  Revision of the Cost Estimate (TCE)
decision_details: - the project will provide drinking water to the people living in the Boralanda and Welimada townships and surrounding areas. The proposal made by Hon. Dinesh Gunawardena, Minister of Water Supply and Drainage, to revise the total cost estimate of the project to Rs.264.73 million, was approved by the Cabinet.
